mapper.select: SELECT house.*,ss.status_value as statusValue,user.xiaohongshu_id as xiaohongshuId,user.xiaohongshu_username as xiaohongshuUsername ,user.`user_name` as userName FROM SheStays.ss_house house left join ss_status ss on ss.status_code = house.status_code left join ss_user user on house.user_id = user.user_id where house.is_delete = 0 and user.is_delete = 0 and house.status_code = 'online' and country_name != '' order by start_time desc limit #{pageIndex},50
SELECT count(*) FROM SheStays.ss_house house where house.is_delete = 0 and status_code = 'online' and country_name != ''

and house.country_name like CONCAT('%',#{region},'%') OR house.city_name like CONCAT('%',#{region},'%')
